com.mygdx.game.audio

Class SoundManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.audio.SoundManager

  • public class SoundManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for all sounds in the game

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SoundManager()
      Constructor for SoundManager load all sounds Automatic starts playing music.
